32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: The same tradition has been narrated on the authority of Zakriyya through the same chain of transmitters with the following addition:" No rebellious Quraishite with al-Asi as his name embraced Islam that day except Muti. His name-was al-Asi, but the Messenger of Allah (way peace be upon him) changed his name to Muti

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يُقْتَلُ قُرَشِيٌّ صَبْرًا بَعْدَ الْفَتْحِ
chapter.eng-name: No man if Quraish is to be captured then killed, after the conquest
